name: Stronger Together (Haiyoooo | Game Designer & Artist, tsairuthvik, Nancylinc)
name_original: Stronger Together (Haiyoooo | Game Designer & Artist, tsairuthvik, Nancylinc)
description:
Play as a single strand of hair, and try not to get plucked!

It’s easier to pluck a single strand of hair, so stick together! Find a pore to hide in before the fingers get you!

Made for Brackeys Game Jam, theme: Stronger Together

Controls

Team

  • Hsi Lin (@Nancylinc) - code & tech art
  • Eunice Lim (@haiyoooo) - 2d art
  • TSR (@tsairuthvik) - code
